name: Our Mountain (itch)
description:
You can also play Our Mountain right now on Steam!


Our Mountain is a 3D narrative, atmospheric, adventure game with little puzzles. Player will play as Charles and Buddy the dog. Explore along the woods that will lead to the city. Enjoy the scenery, soundtrack, and story cutscene. The player can inspect objects and explore the scene to solve the mystery and fully understand the story.

Charles, A man who lives peacefully in the countryside. One day he has a severe problem and has to return to the city located on the other side of the valley as soon as possible. Charles doesn't have much time left and he has to walk through a national park where something supernatural seems to happen.

  • It doesn’t require any good gaming skills.
  • A short video game that can be completed in one play.
  • Enjoy the soundtracks and no rush!
  • Connect and understand the story with your own idea.
  • Cute puppy following you.
